message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still think the product is worth more than that to you. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $12500, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll meet you at $12250. This is the lowest I can go.
I understand that you're willing to meet me at $12250, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. This is my final offer.
